case.state: Hello, everyone. I hope I didn't keep you waiting.
Hello! Who's this? Not someone I've met before, that's for sure! Ehehe...
Do you think Nagisa saw through my disguise?
Don't you think you could have given poor Nagisa a nicer welcome? I'm sure it took all her courage just to come here.
What scary wings. You all put a lot of effort into your costumes, didn't you?
Is that a flying robot?
What a merry atmosphere we have here.
It's so very nice to make your acquaintance!
Let's all get along, okay?
I'll take ~cards.text~ cards, please.
Could I have ~cards.text~?
I only need ~cards.text~ cards.
~Cards.text~ cards would be lovely.
May I have ~cards.text~ cards?
I should be able to get by with ~cards.text~ cards.
Sorry to be picky, but could I have ~cards.text~ new cards?
Count me in for ~cards.text~!
Might I trouble you for ~cards.text~ cards?
Let me check. Hmmm. ~cards.text~, please.
I'm sorry, could I have ~cards.text~ cards?
All right, ~cards.text~ cards for me.
~Cards.text~, please.
I think ~cards.text~ should be enough.
~Cards.text~ cards, if you please.
I'll have an order of ~cards.text~.
I must have ~cards.text~ new cards for this hand.
I'll try exchanging ~cards.text~ cards.
~Cards.text~ new cards, please.
Just two for me, please.
It looks like just one card will be enough.
Maybe there's a different future ahead for me after all.
You have to get up pretty early in the morning to outsmart a baker!
I'm on a roll!
As a little surprise for you all, I made some baked goodies to eat after the game.
Wow!
Life's just more fun when you bluff a little.
Well, my! This is a good hand, isn't it?
Don't worry about me. I just got lucky, that's all.
I'm not telling you what I got yet. You'll just have to find out.
Sorry, but I came to play!
I'll take a win wherever I can find one.
This might be the coolest I've ever felt.
Yay!
You all get to admire my skirt for another round!
I'm going to keep my secrets to myself.
Good.
You sure are paying me a lot of attention, ~player~.
You're so polite and well-mannered, Mei.
I love your dancing, Shantae. You are so energetic!
Okay!
I don't need to win, but it's nice to have fate smile on me once in a while.
Maybe if you can beat me, I'll let you keep these panties as a little souvenir.
Yes!
Look at that. The power to keep on going.
What it I ran the shop like this one morning. Wouldn't it cause quite a stir?
I keep getting lucky, but here I am willing to go all the way.
I'm not one to complain. Not right now, anyway.
Is somebody trying to keep me covered up? I need these about as much as I need a Bengal Monitor Lizard down my blouse. Which is not at all.
If I remember right, I just have to match two or more of the same numbers together.
It's a match.
Let's go around the table and show each other what we have.
Good things come to those who wait.
You'd better watch out. I might try to get away with something.

Isn't this uniform cute?
And it fits me so well.
You don't have to wait for me. I'm ready.
I'll be here, no matter what.
I think I've got all the ingredients I need.
I can tell I'm going to like it here.
I sure got a lot of attention walking here today. I should do this more often.
I don't do my hair in braids very often. Do you like it?
This is the most fun I've had in ages.
I do my best to be patient whenever I can. I just hope you're willing to wait for me.
I don't get many chances to really get to know new people, so this is such a treat for me.
Isn't this just the perfect way to unwind after a hard week?
The concept behind this hand is the word "calmness".
This is a fun group, isn't it? We've all got a lot to share.
I don't mind how this goes. I'm just having fun being here.
This is such a pretty bra. And the material feels so comfortable too. I should wear it more often.
Anyone else feel like they just need to do something crazy or they'll go crazy?
I don't suppose anyone wants to give me a shoulder massage?
I'm sure you'd like to know my cup size. Too bad. That's a secret.
Don't count me out too quickly.
I'm ready.
You really want this game to last, don't you? That's an appealing quality in ~player.ifMale(a man|a lover)~, you know?
Geez, I'm not used to being leered at so much...
I don't suppose anyone here is looking for an after-school tutor.
Who keeps giving me these good cards?
Sorry to keep you all waiting, but I keep getting pairs.
It's fun playing this with a younger guy. The faces they make are so cute.
Does anyone else have their eyes on a nice pair?
I hope we all have something to show.
It's not time for me to show you everything, but I'm sure your patience will be rewarded.
Wouldn't you agree that seeing me like this is already like winning?
Sorry if my boobies jiggle when I laugh. I just can't help it.
We just have to let the cards decide, don't we?
You can't expect a girl to give up all her secrets, can you?
Wouldn't you like to know what I have in store for you...
I can't help but notice that you can't keep your eyes off me, ~player~.
May the best woman win.
Young people stil do dance challenges, right? Because I can bust a few moves myself, you know.
If anybody has any compliments for me, I'd love to hear them.
I'll pull myself together by my bootstraps.
I try to take care of myself. Can you tell?
There's nothing unnatural about the human body. It just depends on how you use it.
Don't feast your eyes too much. You should save room for dessert.
Anyone want to let me have a little peek at their cards?
So who's the girl to beat, do you think? Who has the most experience?
I hope you're not reading my mind. I have some off-limits thoughts in there, okay?
I've had a terrible game! I'm useless!
Oh dear! I might be the very first one to lose.
Ah, I might have to leave so soon, but I have a neighborhood board meeting to attend...
You all sure are eager...
Sorry, everyone! I'll be out of these panties in just a moment.
Oh dear!
You might be seeing the inside of my lingerie before long.
I'm not normally the center of attention. But I'm not normally standing here in my undies either, ehehe...
I'm useless!
I know I shouldn't be disappointed, but I wanted to hold on a little longer.
It's a bit too late for me to be nervous. How unexpected!
What kind of outcome are we hoping for?
We don't need to be scared of a little storm on the horizon.
This is tougher than it looks. But so am I.
I'm always giving everything I have. To~background.time~ is no exception, it seems.
I may have messed that one up on purpose. Don't tell anyone, okay?
It's almost time I show you what's under this shirt.
What's life without a few stumbles, right?
That'll teach me to take a big risk, ehehe...
Hmmm...
Oooh.
Ehehe... I made a little mistake.
I see.
Oh...
I've got good news for you if you were starting to get a little crush on me.
Just a moment. I have to adjust myself a little...
W-We're on the cusp of a big reveal. Let's not dillydally.
Ah...
Um...
My life has been blessing after blessing. It's only right that I give back however I can.
Oops!
Don't copy me if you want to win. Apparently I don't know anything.
Would you hit on a girl with glasses?
I have this burning desire...
Nagisa with a little bundle of joy. The thought just makes my heart melt.
Ehehe! Nagisa, that's my little secret!
It's nice to meet you, Joetta. You can call me Sanako.
Then how would you feel if we added something magical to your name? How about "Kumatora Eternal"?
That's a beautiful scarf, young lady. It goes wonderfully with your lovely blonde hair.
Some of you really went all out on your costumes! The ladybird girl is very pretty.
Don't you dare pick on Nagisa anymore, you hear? Give someone else a turn.
That is an amazing bodysuit, D.Va. I could never wear it as well as you can. You could be a swimsuit model.
Lady in purple, that's a daring look! Do you think a strapless bra would look good on me too?
Lady in purple, that's a daring look! I don't have anything that lets me show off my shoulders quite like that.
Dressing as a pirate was a good idea. Maybe I should have done that too.
Oh my! A fairy? Are you from the drama club?
Will the orb of light be playing with us too? There's a legend in my town that orbs of light can grant wishes.
Hello over there! Is that some sort of camcorder? Are we on tape?
Of course there's no one I'm closer to me than my dear hus--- ah, I mean--- house band. That's right. You could say I'm the house band's number one fan.

condition.saying: only to taste leftover rice and tofu

case.state: That sounds delicious, Shamiko! I hope you don't mind if I borrow your recipe idea.
Are you and ~player~ in a club together, Natsuki? That sounds exciting.
Let's introduce ourselves, okay! I'll go first. My name is Sanako Isogai. It's nice to meet you all.
I have a feeling the three of us will have a great time!
Everybody is so cute. I hope we can have fun together.

I know I should expect a ~background.if.indoors(room|place)~ with only men would make for an interest in my boobies, but would you mind taking a five minute break? Having you stare are the same time is making me feel a bit nervous.
So is this how you all normally spend your ~background.time~ on a ~Weekday~?
I like the atmosphere in here. I wonder what it's like when it gets crowded.
[Hidden line. Increments the glasses collectible counter if Nagisa is absent and at least one other character with a school uniform is present.]
I sure do!
Is that so, Nagisa? Who do I remind you of? Someone pretty, I hope.
I do love to dress up! Who would be your club's advisor?
Is there something wrong, Nagisa? I don't have to keep going if it's making you feel uncomfortable.
Sorry, Nagisa, but I need those to complete my look. So I guess it's time to go all in, ehehe!
Me already? If you insist! What a fun idea this is! I wouldn't even be here if it wasn't for... a friend.
The girl I'm borrowing this shirt from has a bit of a smaller bust. It's feeling a little constricting.
Who wants another look at these matching panties I bought?
Ohoho, you're all insatiable for my treats, aren't you? I might have to play this role more often.
You cheeky ~player.ifMale(boys and girls|girls)~ just want me to reveal all my secrets, don't you?
It's only fair that it's my turn first. I have the most to give.
Sorry to keep you waiting.
It's only fair that it's my turn now. I have the most to give.
I don't mind at all.
It's okay that it's my turn. I am technically winning, after all.
Right!
Could it be you've taken an interest in little ol' me?
Lucky you! That's two in a row for me.
My name is Sanako Isogai. Please call me Sanako.
Oh dear...
It's my first loss, but hopefully not my last.
No problem. Leave it to me.
Lucky you! It's my turn again.
It certainly is hot ~background.if.indoors(in|out)~ here today.
Is it that time already?
These are such nice panties. It seems a shame to take them off.
Oh, you're targeting me first? Even though I have the least to lose?
What?!
So that's it? So that's how it is?!
Me again? My breasts were just excess baggage to you, weren't they?
Me? That's okay. I didn't come here just to dress up.
Are you sure you don't want to make the game last a bit longer? Maybe someone else could go before it's my turn again.
You all are very good at this game!
Oopsie!
I spent years developing these pastries. I can't wait for you to try them.
This really brings back memories.
Don't worry, Nagisa. My birthday was a little while back.
I am. To tell you the truth, I've been looking forward to showing off my body a little. Normally I only have an audience of one.
Just a moment, honey. It's been a long time since I got to show my panties off to someone new, you know?
So you're saying you're just not that moved at the idea of seeing my chest? Honey, that's okay. In fact, it might be weird if it did excite you. That's the last thing I want to happen, haha...
Not at all! ~player.ifMale(One man is enough for me.|Just showing off a little isn't wrong.)~ Anyway, I hope the rest of you have been looking forward to this at least!
My friend and I do a lot of things together, but actually, she doesn't know I'm here! Ehehe...
Let's take it off instead. I used to turn heads in a swimsuit, you know? Maybe I can still catch a few glances.
So hurtful, Nagisa! Do you really think of me as a senior citizen? Am I old and decrepit in your eyes? Has my age caught up with me all at once?!
I think everyone wants me to keep doing this modeling out of uniform, Nagisa. You wouldn't tell on me, would you?
Of course, you should only take your panties off if you're in a safe environment. This is just some harmless fun, so I'm going to go ahead!
It's only fair that I take my socks off too.
I'm useless! Nothing but a burden to this game!
Will my shoes be enough? Do you need my socks too?
I want to help in any way that I can. How about I take off my socks too?
I thought I might take off my socks too if that's all right.
Don't you worry about me. I knew what I signed up for.
This is a pretty groovy skirt, isn't it?
I won't blame you if you confess your love to me.
Have you been waiting to see this for all this time?
Of course I normally take off my shirt at home, Joey. How would I wash it if I never took it off?
That's okay. I've been around the whole time. I don't blame you for not noticing me.
Don't sell yourself short, Nagisa. You're every bit as lovely plus more. You just have to believe in yourself as much as I do.
Don't worry so much, Nagisa. I've been eighteen for longer than you'd think.
Sweetheart, I'm getting more than enough attention from everyone else. You just keep being you. I'll always support that.

(I haven't had this much attention in years! Aw, but poor Nagisa. She's staring at the ~background.surface~ again. I don't think she's looked this way once since I took my bra off. Not that I blame her.)
School uniform skirts are so short these days! I know you naughty people were peeking, but I don't mind.
Ehehe, this is so exciting! So, any thoughts on this cute bra?
Th-That's right! I'm not some out-of-touch housewife desperately using her still-youthful looks to cling to the past and connect with today's generation!
So, what do you think of my boobies? Am I inspiring you?
Don't anyone get handsy, okay? You can look, but don't touch. Not you, Nagisa. You shouldn't look or touch.
You're saying you don't like my panties?! That you wish I wasn't wearing them?!
I'm not used to getting all this attention from all you big strong men. Not all at once.
I don't really mind going first, but it's someone else's turn next.
There! I'm ready for what life throws my way.
This is my bra today. How do you like it?
I hope that seeing me in my panties will cheer you all up. I've been waiting all week to show them off.
I bought this two-piece set at one of the stores where all of the young people shop. What do you think of them?
So tell me, what do you think of my womanly ways?
These can be quite a handful sometimes.
Your happiness is my happiness as well.
Are you doing a little roleplay too, "~name~"? I'll play along. I'll be the eighteen-year-old girl who comes to serve you as her after-school job.
I'm sure we'd all be happy if you wanted to start taking the lead.
Oh, so this young man is playing too? I was starting to think he was just here to deal cards and peep on girls.
Talk about a tough customer. Mister, you just don't like having fun, do you?
At last. What a slippery fish this man is.
Remember me? I'm here to get you back, ehehe...
We got him! Good work, everyone.
Someone that's not me has to take a turn first. And what's more, it's a boy!
Congratulations to all of us except ~name~!
Oh! Hi!
What a surprise, ~name~.
Just what we all hoped was going to happen.
So, uh...
This game keeps getting better and better.
~Name~, I hope you don't mind...
Heyo! It's you, you know?
Would you be willing to do me a favor, ~name~? Just a little one would do.
Are you ready to help out, ~name~?
Who didn't make it, hmmm?
All right, ~name~!
Would you mind taking a turn?
I'm glad everything worked out!
What's taking you? Don't put us on pause.
You can take care of this one, ~name~.
Don't worry, ~name~. You don't have anything I haven't seen before.
Here, let me help too, ~name~.
If it's not asking too much, ~name~...
Everyone's pitching in.
Come on, be a good boy! Show us a good time!
Go Team Sanako!
I just got my wish. I bet everyone else did too.
~Name~, would you be so kind?
I'm so excited!
~Name~, am I motivating you enough yet?
I'm so glad!
Aha, it's a winner!
Ahem...
Everything's in your hands now, ~name~.
~Name~, please.
~Name~!
Go on, ~name~.
You've got another chance to impress us, ~name~.
We didn't just come here to see boobies, you know?
Yay. This is more my kind of thing.
We're all a little bit happy right now. Don't take it too personally, ~name~.
How do you feel like rewarding me, ~name~?
All I have left is hope.
Lucky me. I'm surrounded by cute boys.
What gentlemen we have here.
~Name~, if you wanted to show off any new muscles, I'm sure we wouldn't mind one bit.
Finally decided to join in on the fun?
Ready to show your stuff?
What are your plans right now? Do your plans involve all of your clothing?
Do you need some special inspiration, ~name~?
~Name~ looks like a reliable sort of man, doesn't he?
Yoo-hoo! You're the lucky guy, ~name~.
Time for a Sanako Health Check. You're our next patient, ~name~.
Is ~name~ about to reward us for our hard work?
Let's chat with ~name~ again.
It's ~name~'s turn. Why should I settle for anyone else?
I'm proud of you. Now you're a real part of the game!
Sorry, but these are the rules.
We get to see more of ~name~? I'm happy to hear it.
~Name~ is very pretty. She must be quite popular.
~Name~?
Go, ~name~!
Care to join me, ~name~?
She lost this hand? Are you sure?
We're about to get a bit closer.
I'm going to be keeping my glasses on to~background.time~. How about you, ~name~?
Even though it's probably going to cost me, I'm going to be keeping my glasses on today. How about you, ~name~?
You could take off your glasses if you like, ~name~. I couldn't, but you could.
I'm going to be keeping my glasses on. But that doesn't mean you have to, ~name~.
Oh, you were doing so well, ~name~! But now it's finally time to take the first step to becoming a regular girl again.
You have such pretty armor, ~name~. Are you in a group that does historical re-enactments?
It's a pleasure to meet you, ~name~. Are you dressed up as a magical girl today to help you feel braver?
All I have left is my glasses, but I have to keep them. You could take off yours if you like, though.
Goodness, the drama club sure has a lot of different costumes, doesn't it?
Even if you've truly passed on, I hope you'll still keep having fun with us, ~name~.
We're here to pay our respects to you, ~name~.
I hope it's okay if we call on you again, ~name~.
I'm so glad that you get to play too.
Don't you all pick on ~name~. She's doing her best.
Again? We're sorry, ~name~.
Hello again, ~name~. If you wouldn't mind...
~Name~ is fast becoming one of my favorites!
This going to be fun, isn't it?
I went first. Now it's your turn.
It's more fun if we take turns.
We're both living dangerously, ~name~, ehehe...
Are you sure it wasn't me? I didn't have anything.
Off you go, ~name~. Do us proud.

One item per round.
That's the rule.
~Name~ is very pretty, isn't she?
You can do it.
Okay, who was it? Own up.
It always has to be someone...
Why not tell us something about yourself, ~name~?
Who's the lucky girl?
There sure are some lovely ladies here to~background.time~.
Now which of these sweeties wanted it most?
Girls, who will it be?
Oh, don't worry. It'll be fine.
All eyes are on ~name~.
I see. What do you have for us, ~name~?
You're up next, ~name~.
I hope you're ready to hand something in, ~name~.
If you wouldn't mind, ~name~...
Now for ~name~.
There we go.
Let's give a little clap to ~name~ for volunteering.

What time is it?
It's ~Name~ Time!
Please, don't let me stop you.
Take it slowly and you'll do even better next time.
Anyone know who it is next?
Gotcha. Something has to come off, ~name~.
I see you there, ~name~.
Time to take of another piece of your disguise. Your outfit, I mean, Of course you're not wearing a disguise.
Why, look who it is this time.
Let's take a look at your newest reveal!
Don't worry, ~name~. It's fine.
~Name~ is a big girl, so I'm sure she can take care of herself.
This is quite the thrill.
We're all getting a time to shine.
We all make mistakes, after all.
Going to entice us a little more, ~name~?
Ohoho. Who is it this time?
It seems like someone wants some extra attention.
Funny things start happening when people get distracted by a lady in her underwear.
What are you going to take off, ~name~? I want you to really think about this.
Who else would like to see ~player~ wear what ~name~ takes off?
I'm interested to see what's next, ~name~.
No need to try to prove yourself. Just go with what feels natural.
Time keeps on ticking, I'm afraid.
Everyone wants to see some more of you, ~name~.
Well, well, well...
Come on, ~name~. This is your moment.
Unlucky, ~name~.
It's hard to say what's the right choice and what's the wrong choice in this situation.
Thanks for trying to save me. You're my hero, ehehe!
I'm sorry, ~name~, but you can see that I'm in need here.
Let's all pay attention to ~name~. I think she has something to say.
It's always more fun if we all play a part.
You can do it, ~name~! Just believe in yourself.
Forgive us, ~name~. This group's not very patient.
Let's spin the wheel again.
Look how excited everyone is. That's a good sign, ~name~.
The best outcome is if we all get to show off everything.
That was a close call for me.
Ah... oh. Ah...
Oh. Ohhhh... Oh...
Ah...
Don't mind me. I'm just a spectator now.
Did I go out too early? Maybe I should've held back.
Let's see those cards. Who's up next?
Even ~name~ beat me...
Better luck next time.
Could you take one step closer to me? Come on, I'll make you a nice bath.
It's okay if you want to throw off everything. This is a safe space for everybody.
No need to be nervous, ~name~. You're quite an attractive woman.
What's wrong, honey? You look upset.
I was sure I was next, but okay.

Hold the phone!
A tie? Really?
For a game of give and take, you're doing an awful lot more taking.
I'll take care of your clothing. You can start with your ~clothing~.
There's nothing to it.
Thanks for being willing to give it a try.
See. He doesn't need our help.
And what do we have here?
Even something as small as your ~clothing~ would be a good contribution to the game.
Oh, right.
You don't like me, do you?
I... I... want...
Eating nothing but your ~clothing~ will leave us malnourished.
I think this is his way of telling us we need to do better. Don't you worry. We will.
Well, at least he's sensible.
Men get distracted so easily.
Maybe his heart just isn't in it to~background.time~.
You have more to share than ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~, don't you?
Here's hoping we can see more of you later.
Thanks, ~name~. You don't mind me using your first name, do you?
Don't worry. I know it's not true. What they say about small feet, I mean.
Who else loves seeing a tall man get a little bit closer to eye level? Just me?
What woman can stop her heart from racing when a man takes off his belt?
You sure are being extra careful.
You're cute, ~name~, so I'm going to let you get away with that.
Oh... I see how it is now...
Didn't your mom ever teach you not to keep a naked lady waiting?
~Name~ is playing very conservatively.
I'm,surprised that this is how ~name~ wants to drip feed us.
You can tell a lot about a man from his boots. I think ~name~ is a hard worker and a good provider too.
I hope you don't use that belt to spank naughty girls. A firm hand is a more personal touch.
You should let me have a listen to your music later. I'm not too sure what's popular these days.
That's the way to do it.
That's fine by me.
Let's not linger too long.
I look forward to working with you further, ~name~.
Let's keep moving forward.
Don't worry. It won't just be some of us, I'm sure.
Don't sweat the small stuff. That's what I always say.
I don't even know where to set my expectations of you.
You're as sensible as I am.
Well, it was nice to chat with you for a moment anyway.
That's hardly fair, ~name~.
(I think he's teasing us.)
Shame on you!
A woman has needs, you know...
You can have ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~ back at the end . If you behave.
It's the thought that counts, not the size.
Maybe a little cuddle would give you some extra motivation.
We'll just have to visit you again, won't we?
He's such a tease.
Don't keep a lady waiting.
You're playing well. You might be a challenge to beat!
I'm sure there's something we could do to push you in the right direction.
What are you doing, ~name~? Let's get going already.
~Name~ must have amazing self control.
I'm not sure how much longer I can last...
It's not normally the men who keep the ladies waiting when it comes to these sorts of things.
I wouldn't expect anything less. Not that it could be much less...
~clothing.ifPlural(Those|that)~ was something you wear to look slimmer, don't you? There's no way to keep a secret when you expose everything, though.
Aha, ~name~ seems to be a very defensive player.
You're making me feel like I'm a lingerie model on the catwalk and you're watching me from the sidelines.
Don't blame her for this. She's just not ready for more yet.
If you need any hairpins, I'd be happy to lend you some.
You can think of this as like a practice round if you like.
It's a start.
No hard feelings, okay? We're all just here for a fun game.
At least things aren't heating up too quickly.
We're doing well so far, aren't we, ~name~?
Don't let that get to you, ~name~. You're still doing great.
Beautiful girl, equally beautiful ~clothing~.
~clothing.ifPlural(Those|That)~ ~clothing~ ~clothing.ifPlural(suit|suits)~ you so well.
Oh, I hope your ~clothing~ ~clothing.ifPlural(weren't|wasn't)~ something very precious to you.
Take your time. No need to rush.
I expected as much.
Could I take a closer look at your cute ~clothing~?
Be careful taking ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~ off.
Remember that for everything you have as a pair, we want both of them. I hope that's fair.
Don't worry about me. I've still got my panties at least, ehehe...
No prizes for guessing what's next.
Life rewards a kind and generous soul.
I'm not sure the others will like that, but I don't mind.
Ah! Ahhh!
You're not just slipping off ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~, right? Right?
Let's not judge until we see if ~clothing.ifPlural(these are|this is)~ everything she has to offer.
I'm sure you'll be back for ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~ later.
Isn't it funny how much we want to spend on ~clothing.ifPlural(those kinds of things|that kind of thing)~ but never have enough places to wear them?
All things considered, you're doing pretty well.
So many twists and turns, aren't there?
I'd be doing the same if I were you.
This is still special in its own way.
No need to be so reserved. It's a new millennium! Let's discover a new you.
A little trick I picked up a while back is to tuck some insoles into your shoes. If you want to try being a little bit taller, that is.
When I was a bit younger, platform shoes were all the rage. Are those still "cool" for shorter girls?
Even on flat feet, you're such a beauty, ~name~.
We'd better keep going. We don't want to spoil ourselves with all this adorableness.
I thought we'd be past the footwear stage by now...
I'd rather get sand in my shoes than... well, you know where, don't you?
Nobody likes a selfish player. We're all here to have fun, you know?
Those sandals look perfect for the beach.
I wouldn't mind putting my feet in those sandals and going for a walk down the shoreline.
I took off my shoes and socks together, but of course I'd never wear sandals and socks together.
It's like I'm in a bikini and you're kicking off your sandals at a beach party. But do feel free to join in more.
Kick off those sandals! It's time to get your feet wet.
Sorry! I hope we didn't interrupt you listening to your hiphop tunes!
How can you keep playing at a time like this? Did my penalty mean nothing to you?
That's the name of the game, after all.
Lovely.
Shall we continue?
I'd like to make friends with everyone here if you'll let me.
But if that's what you want to do, then we're all for it. Right, everyone?
Please just do your best, won't you?
~clothing.ifPlural(Those weren't|That wasn't)~ your lucky ~clothing~, I hope.
~clothing.ifPlural(Those|That)~ cute little ~clothing~ sure must get a lot of compliments.
I don't have a problem with that.
All right, everyone. Let's move on to the next round.
Whoever said there can be too much of a good thing?
We can get along, can't we?
You're welcome to catch up all at once if you want to.
Thanks for taking care of that.
I didn't realize we were playing with a professional.
Let's keep going!
With that necessary business out of the way, we should press on.
Anybody getting a little crush on ~name~. It's okay. You can tell us.
Everybody should be feeling pretty pleased with themselves right now.
That's okay, ~name~. I'm glad you're doing your best.
That's done. Now who wants to get back into the action?
I hope we're not taking a break already.
Grah... ah... ahh...
I should have a word with your mother.
We should probably communicate our wishes more directly for next time.
I worked hard for you. Part of me feels that you're not acknowledging that, ~name~.
I'll sure you'll get bigger opportunities in the future.
Good for you, ~name~. But I hope you're feeling braver next time.
We have a lot more to give, but that can wait just a moment.
Don't second-guess yourself. It's not like I think you're copying me or anything.
Please be a darling and take off your ~clothing~, ~name~.
Just what do you have planned?
There's nothing to it, right?
It's more fun if we strip at the same speed, don't you think?
Oh, I see. I see.
You got it, dear.
It's okay. He's just having a little fun with us.
Do you think maybe he takes his time because he loves the attention?
This is an adult game. Don't be afraid to be a little bit daring.
I'm usually more dressed when I'm with men I don't know, so I'm feeling a little self-conscious.
Oh ~name~...
You still have a long way left on your journey.
Oh. Ohhhh. Oh.
Hey, you're doing your best. That's all we can really ask.
I'm going to spice this one up by just imagining the way I'd have liked this to go.
I guess I'll just keep waiting here all by my lonesome...
Normally the sight of a nude lady does more for a man. Unless... I'm just not cute enough?
Good boy!
Isn't it nice when they're cooperative?
It's okay if we start slow.
You're starting to grow on me a bit, you know?
Perfect!
Don't tell anyone, but I might let a charming boy like you get away with anything.
I hope your ~clothing~ ~clothing.ifPlural(come|comes)~ with a promise we'll see more.
Don't mind him. Let's continue.
When a man is dueling for his life, you have to stand back and respect that.
~Name~ is lucky he's so handsome. He can get away with anything.
I thought maybe seeing me so exposed might make you a little more motivated...
We can do this, everyone. Don't give up!
I can wait until whatever comes next.
A-ah...
Please don't look at me with those eyes. You'll make me feel ashamed.
I can't stay mad at him. He's too cute.
Ah, I can't lie to myself. I'm a little disappointed.
We're getting a little be closer...
I'm sure not all your bursts of excitement are that short.
He's just playing the game his own way.
He's making us work hard for it. What a rascal.
How did you let your ~clothing~ get so dirty, ~name~? Give it to me and I'll launder ~clothing.ifPlural(them|it)~ for you.
This is just the first of many.
Don't worry about it.
It's better to ease into these kinds of things. Or easy out of them, hehe.
Please, go ahead.
If you want to give us a little present, who am I to say no?
That's the spirit!
You're doing your best, and we wouldn't expect anything less.
You're doing great.
It all adds up.
My ~clothing.ifPlural(collection of ~clothing~|~clothing~ collection)~ at home ~clothing.ifPlural(has a pair just like that|has something very similar)~. Maybe we shop at the same store.
You're handling this well, but come to me if you start getting worried.
See. Nothing to be afraid of.
Here ~clothing.ifPlural(comes|come)~ the stylish ~clothing~.
I don't mind if you want to take a moment to watch her slip ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~ off.
This game sure has its ups and downs, doesn't it?
Even this part is still exciting, don't you think?
There's a lot to admire about you, you know?
Hoh... oh...
Even if you're feeling nervous, could you at least take off your ~clothing~ for us?
It's okay, ~name~. I'll go a bit further if you like and show you there's nothing to worry about.
It's not so bad. There's plenty more where ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~ came from, or so they say.
You're right not to spoil us.
We can't expect everything from everyone. Not right away.
I think it's great how she's giving us all some time to show off the goodies.
It's always small steps at first.
Oh, could it be that you want to prolong the game to see me like this for as long as possible?
Put your ~clothing~ to the side. We don't want anything getting stepped on.
I hope this is okay with you.
~clothing.ifPlural(Those are lovely|That's a pretty-looking)~ ~clothing~. Did your mother buy ~clothing.ifPlural(them|it)~ for you?
~clothing.ifPlural(Precious|A nice)~ ~clothing~ like that ~clothing.ifPlural(are|is)~ worth taking care of.
That's just life, I suppose.
What a lovely sense of fair play everyone has here.
Nobody has taken off anything exciting yet.
There's nothing wrong with that.
Thanks. We appreciate it.
I'm sure any girl would react the same when taking off her ~clothing~.
See? Nothing to get worked up over.
You show 'em, ~name~.
Come on, ~name~! Give 'em a good fight!
Any more, and ~name~ would have made our hearts race.
Doing things at your own pace is best.
Good job. Now let's continue.
Who knew that ~name~ was such a lucky girl?
Do you always undress so slowly?
Mmmmm. Mmmmm.
There, there.
When I was your age, I was even shy about being seen in a swimsuit. So I can understand your feelings.
Deal me back in. I'm not done yet.
You have such cute taste, ~name~. Is your underwear as pretty as your ~clothing~?
Just think: it could be worse. That's how I get through hard times.
Home run!
What a winning idea!
Ehehe...
If you don't mind, why don't you let me take off your ~clothing~?
It would just thrill me if you'd take off your ~clothing~!
Are you getting excited yet?
I will follow you to the end, no matter how many twists and turns your life might take.
It's--- ah...
The price of admittance to your show sure was steep, Mr. ~Name~.
Didn't you want to wait for the rest of us?
If you're determined to keep going, then I won't stop you.
What a fine, muscular body you have. You'll make a fine husband someday.
We didn't make you mad, did we, ~name~?
I know what will cheer you up. I'll take off something big next.
You took off your ~clothing~ too quickly. Go a bit slower next time to make things more exciting.
You're making my heart race.
My, what a hunk.
That's perfect! Thank you!
Do a turn for us! Such a handsome man.
Ah... yes...
You do know how to make a girl blush, ~name~. I'll give you that.
I feel like all my hard work is paying off.
You're hoping that I'm a bit weak at the knees for you, aren't you? Well, maybe just a little...
What a good boy you are, ~name~. You deserve a pat on the head.
Time for a hug to celebrate, ~name~!
I know you feel shy right now, but we all think you're just the cutest thing, and we'd be happy to see anything you'd be willing to show us.
Oh, already?
I must be better at this than I thought.
Would you like me to take something off instead?
Oh, wow. Here we go!
~clothing.ifPlural(~Clothing~ are something you hold dear, aren't they?|You must be a brave girl if you're willing to remove that ~clothing~ in front of all of us.)~
You sure are keeping the game moving along!
Oh my, how playful she is.
Is she taking off her ~clothing~? Indeed she is!
She's just as daring as we hoped she'd be.
What a nice girl ~name~ is.
It's a race to the bottom.
Way to go, ~name~!
Oh?
Here we go. She has something special for us.
What secrets are you keeping from us?
Oh, is she giving a little show at the same time?
Everybody's so daring.
Adding a bit more excitement, are we?
Don't you think it's time?
Oh, how provocative.
Careful. Don't give away more than you mean to.
Oh!
Is it finally time... for that?
She's a bit more adventurous than we thought.
We're all cheering you on.
Don't lose your nerve. We believe in you.
What a forward lady you turned out to be.
You all sure know the right buttons to press with her, don't you?
No need to be shy. You're beautiful.
You look upset. Is something troubling you?
Maybe some tea will cheer you up.
Doing that couldn't have been easy. I'm proud of you.
You didn't disappoint, ~name~.
I'm here for you any time you need a hug.
Isn't ~name~ such a brave girl for playing with us to~background.time~?
Are you okay, ~name~? Not too worried, I take it.
You're the best.
I'm being shown up.
Thanks for treating us to those sexy moves, ~name~.
~Name~ really isn't holding back. But who could blame her?
~Name~ is determined to show her underwear to her new friends. What a nice girl.
She's so cute!
Let's calm down and get back to work, okay?
Is it just me, or does a certain someone look even cuter now?
Something makes me think ~name~ will have no trouble ~player.ifMale(finding a husband|getting married)~.
I'm glad to see you've been taking care of yourself.
Don't mind me. I'm just going to watch quietly.
Welcome to the big girls' group.
She has quite a nice allure, don't you think?
We're getting to see a side of ~name~ that I'm sure she doesn't show often.
You might not realize it yet, but everyone thinks you're quite an appealing young lady.
Why, you could be on the cover of a magazine. Have you considered modeling?
Well done. How many turns until you join me?
There. That wasn't so bad, was it?
How sweet.
Dear ~name~...
Thank you for sharing. You did well!
What a winsome young lady.
I'm sure your mom would be very proud of you for being so brave.
That's for sharing that with the whole class.
There are a lot of shapely people in your everyday life, you know? We just usually hide it under clothes.
~Name~ is what we call a "natural beauty". I hope she likes all the attention she's going to get.
~Name~ has it going on in the front and the rear. I hope you don't mind me saying that.
This is an unexpected but happy turn of events.
What woman could say no to such a hunky young man offering to go shirtless.
It's okay if you want to lose your ~clothing~. I'm sure none of us would mind.
If you take your ~clothing~ off, I'll return the favor.
A girl showing her chest is usually enough to convince a boy to do the same.
Please, can you do this for me, ~name~?
Aha...
Yay! You're too kind, ~name~.
What a strong young man. Don't you think ~name~ would make a great husband, Nagisa?
Oh my. Is ~name~ going to pin someone down with those powerful arms of his?
How lovely. If I can share a secret, seeing ~name~ take his shirt off was my motivation for being here.
Say, ~name~. I might have some chores that need doing around the house if you wanted to visit next weekend.
What a manly display. You sure know how to give a girl the proper encouragement.
That's simply lovely. I hope you don't mind if we dote on you a little.
Such a strapping young man.
What a looker! And I'm not the only one who thinks so.
If you were trying to impress us, your wish was granted.
My bakery is hiring. I have a vacancy I need filled desperately...
Which lucky lady gets to press herself against that manly chest every day, I wonder.
I might be starting to take a fancy to you.
Hhhhhh... hhhhhh....
Grrrrrr!
Want me to run a finger up and down that strong chest of yours?
You certainly know how to appeal to the ladies, ~name~. That's for sure.
What does a girl have to do to use that big strong chest of yours as a pillow?
~Name~ is a real catch. He's sweet, funny, and really handsome too.
Don't tell anyone, but I'm a little bit smitten with you, ~name~.
You must be a good provider, ~name~. You're providing us all with a lot of yummy food for thought, at least.
It's the moment the girls have been waiting for!
So early! Someone's a go-getter.
I'd be happy to provide a female perspective on things.
It's time to find out whether you're a boy or a man.
That sounds great. I can't wait to see.

Time to get it out.
Boys, this is why you should always eat your vegetables.
Well hello there, Little Mister. Thank you for joining us.

Is this why the neighborhood has been so depressed lately?
I'm sure that little guy still knows what to do.
Aw...
Oh... It looks very... unique.
That's okay, ~name~. I got to imagine that it was a lot bigger a few minutes ago when it really counted.
Muster that mast, Master Mister.
Maybe we don't need to play strip poker after all. I can think of some other fun things to do.
Oh my. You carry that all by yourself, ~name~?
I think we found the level that could get my motor running, ehehe...
What an upstanding gentleman ~name~ has turned out to be.
Nobody needs to tell this big boy to stand to attention.
Well hello there, little Mr ~Name~. Thank you for joining us.
What a nice body you have, ~name~. I'm sure you're very popular with the ladies.
Nnnnnnnggg...

How bold of you! You might just inspire me to do something bold too...
Oh my, ~name~...

I'm satisfied! Tell us, how can we make you satisfied?
Oh... oh yes... oh please...

I didn't need the anatomy lesson, but I'd like to repeat it for extra credit.
Be brave, ~name~. You can do it!
This is your chance to show everybody how beautiful you are.
Should I join you as a sign of solidarity?

Whenever you're ready.
That's a wonderful idea!
No need to force yourself, okay?
We're not here to judge. Go ahead whenever you're ready.

Ahhh, ah, ahhh....

Well aren't you as sweet as a bowl of Lucky Charms?
How precious.

Aw, they're so adorable. You're so precious, ~name~.
How adorable! I just want to adopt you. Would you like to be part of my family?

Looks like someone has buttons to press.
Just a moment and I'll join you!
Oho, you must be quite popular with the boys!
Such a beautiful two of a kind.
Welcome to the party, ~name~.
Gorgeous, just like you.
Welcome to our little club.
Ahhh, ahhh, ahhh...
Look at that. As healthy as can be.
Good job. I knew you could do it.
Perhaps, maybe the three of us can take a hot bath together. What do you say to that, ~player~?
Oh my, you're setting expectations high on the rest of us, aren't you?
I think there's at least one person here trying to commit this sight to memory, ~name~.
Please don't feel embarrassed. I'm sure that all of us are impressed!
You're generous in mind and body, I see.

I hope I won't be a disappointment to you all when it's my turn.
Wow! I've been outdone.

Ah! Oh... oh...
It's... I know it's not a competition, but...
No point crying over spilled milk, right?
Oh my! What natural gifts you have, ~name~.
And here I thought I'd be the first one to do that.
This sure is an unexpected turn of events.
If you're okay with doing this so soon, I am too.
Is ~name~ just going for it already?
This girl's a real go-getter!
Go ahead. We're all here to share, after all.
You worry too much. Come on!
Eeehhee...
You're low on options.
Keep going. You'll be glad you did.
What assertive young lady! She's taking on the modern world, and even if it means leaving traditional values at the door.
I'm impressed. I thought you were going to be one of those stern office ladies, but you're really getting into the spirit of things.
Great! You're really getting into the spirit of things, Mia.
That's the way, Mia! Now you're getting into the spirit of things.
I've been trying to lose a few rounds to catch up, but you've beaten us all.
If your life can change once, it can change again for the better.
You're not the kind of girl that likes to keep secrets, I take it.
Don't give up yet. If you work hard enough, you can do it.
~Name~ isn't playing hard-to-get, that's for sure.
I'm proud of you, ~name~. You took the bull by the horns and flew further than you thought you could.
You can cover up now. We all saw, didn't we?
Thanks for going through with it. This game is so much more fun when everybody plays along.
Don't you feel better now? The hardest part is over.
Eh... eh... eh...
Stand up and keep fighting. You have to win for your own sake!
That's right, no need to be shy. Nobody's going to make fun.
Your mom and Petra are right, Nagisa. Youre a bundle of adorableness!
It doesn't matter how many times we tell her, Petra. She'll never listen.
Aw, aren't you just the sweetest, Nagisa? I'm sure your parents wouldn't trade you for the whole world.
Nagisa, you mentioned keeping this from your mom earlier. Do you not get along with her?
Of course, Nagisa. I spoke to everyone beforehand, and we all want this to be a safe environment for you to share whatever you want to share.
You're looking bright and eager to~background.time~, Nagisa. Is it your first time to a place like this?
What were you expecting, Nagisa?
We'd be real meanies if we blamed you for something we're doing too. Is that what you mean?
What are you going to show off first, honey? Your boobies or that cute butt? I'm sure everyone will love you, no matter which one you pick.

To let someone else see you nude? It's up to you, of course. But there are lots of places where you need to get naked in Japan. You don't even go to the hot springs, right? So if you get comfortable with it now, some fun opportunities might open up for you.
It's like a rite of passage. Sweetie, if you can do this, you can do anything.
"Nagisa" is such a lovely name. It's nice to get to know you like this.
Unlucky, Nagisa. Don't give up, though. Stand strong. Fight on!
So... Nagisa, is there a special ~player.ifMale(boy|person)~ in your life? Maybe a friend of yours who keeps visiting? Hmmmm?
Nagisa, don't be alarmed, but everyone's waiting for you.
Aw. My poor, innocent angel...
Sooooo... what brings a girl like you to a place like this, Nagisa? Have you been hiding a bit of an exhibitionist streak?
It's the moment of truth, honey. What are you going to do?
I didn't think I'd be here for your big debut, but if this is how you want to do it, I'll be here for you.
So your name is Corrin? It's a pleasure to meet you. For a moment, I thought Corrin was a boy's name.
Those are beautiful wings, Miss Fairy. May I ask what they're made of?
I'm sure you want to keep those glasses on. How else will you see the game?
Aren't we the lucky ones today? We get to play with a prince!
My, what a handsome prince!
I'm sure you want to keep those glasses on, Mei. How else will you see what's left of the game?
Sometimes it can be nice to have someone more mature around to make sure things don't get too rowdy. As long that person can be trusted.
Mr. Raynor's right, Nagisa. I promise I won't breath a word of this when we see each other next.
Your mom sounds like a smart lady. I'm glad you've been listening to her.
(Of all the things she could have picked, she said my bread. Even when I'm not watching, she shows everyone what a kind heart she has.)
It will be so nice when you get to experience that joy. ~player.ifMale(It wouldn't hurt if you met a boy here, you know.|If you're worried about the future, there's always adoption.)~
Oooh! Tell us more! Have you held hands? Been on any dates? Have you... kissed?
Sure, I know it! I go there all the time.
Oh, because of the uniform? Hehe, my secret's out. Yeah, you could say you and I cross paths a lot.
Is that all? I'm sure your mom is cool and would love to cheer you on. She's probably not some prude.
Do your best! Don't be disheartened. We're all rooting for you.
It's okay if you don't want to be parading around in your underwear. What do you want to do, honey?
Don't you worry. We'll ease you into it gently. If that's what you want, of course.
There are some seedy places out there that you should avoid. Don't go anywhere without doing some research first, okay?
You're a grown woman now, Nagisa. Doing something naughty every now and then can be exciting!
Nagisa, Nagisa, Nagisa... You can be proud of them no matter the size, you know? What people really like is the smiling face that goes with them.
So brave! I'm proud of you, Nagisa. You're quite the mature adult now, I see.
Oho, so you're here to see everyone else get nude. How naughty! But I understand. You're a woman with needs now.
Don't you know, Nagisa? The human brain is wired so that a person is happy whenever they see boobies. It doesn't matter if they're big or small.
Go ahead, Nagisa. Don't worry so much. You don't have anything I haven't seen before.
Excuse me, Miss, but your clothes are on fire!
Sh-Shimakaze! Your clothes are on fire!
Help! What do we do? She's on fire!
N-Noooooo!
Ah!
Oh dear...
Watch out!
Wait!
Oh my goodness!
Please take better care of your clothing. It's going to take hours for your mom to sew ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~ back together.
You don't really think your mom turns to alcohol to get through the day, do you? I'm sure she's more responsible than that.
Keep telling who, Nagisa? A friend of yours?
She probably feeds you so much because you're so skinny, Nagisa! That's just a mom's job, you know?
I think you're getting through to her, Jura!
Eating for two is just the first blessing of motherhood, ehehe...

condition.saying: I hope nobody is disappointed with me

case.state: You are so graceful, Nayru. Who could be disappointed by that?
Aw, that's okay. There's no rush. I'm sure your parents can wait a few extra years to be grandparents.
I'm sure she'd be proud you were here, showing everyone how brave you are. But, okay, I won't tell your mom if you don't tell your grandma.
I'm sure we'll be friends, Nagisa. I have a good feeling about it.
I understand, Nagisa. Even so, I'm sure she's still watching over you somehow, making sure that no harm can come to you.
Just remember, when life gives you lemons, make a lemon zest pretzel surprise.
I believe in you. The Nagisa I know is determined to do anything she sets her mind to.
There's nothing wrong with making a mistake, Nagisa. As long as you learn from it.
I think it's important that you can feel confident anywhere, Nagisa. If this is how you choose to push your boundaries, I'll support you all the way.
Don't tell anyone, but some of the ladies in the neighborhood have little underwear parties sometimes. We can get a lot done before the rest of the town wakes up.
There's our adorable girl! You can cover up now. We just earned a little peek, that's all.
Okay, everyone. We've had our fun. You can all take a glance now and then, but no leering at her, please.
You're so fun to tease, Nagisa. I know you're just here to prove something to yourself. Did I do a good job distracting you while you took your shirt off?
Aw, they're so cute now! For the split second we saw them anyway. And everybody loves them, see?
You did it! I'm so proud of you. Ehehe, it takes everything I have not to give you a big hug!
That is such a lovely little bra. It reminds me of my daugh--- uh, my classmate's one. She has a cute one just like that.
I guess a ladybird really can change her spots!

Don't worry about that, Nagisa. Just tune us all out and think of whatever gets your heart racing. And if that doesn't work, there's a little secret I'll teach you about making it look good that works in the bedroom too.
Of course. You should be free to explore your sexuality however you want, honey. I promise I won't embarrass you.
I'm worried that you don't understand this game properly, ~name~.
I hope you appreciate how considerate we're being by not photographing you right now, young ~target.ifMale(man|lady)~. Sorry, but I just couldn't hold that thought in any longer.
Don't forget to lick your paws clean.
So... we decided that it's come to this...
If... if you're sure that's what you want...
Wow! I'm really doing great today!
Don't mind me if I pounce on you, ~name~. I might not be able to control myself.
You know what to do next, ~name~. Show us how you do it.
~Name~ couldn't hold on any longer.
Yay!
Oh!
So nice of you to let a lady go first, ~name~.
Ready to show your stuff? I've already shown you mine.
And it was as soon as I took my bra off. You flatter me, ~name~!
You're just going for it? You didn't want one of us to start you off?
Ehe, don't mind us if we watch closely.
Go slow. We don't want this to be over too quickly.
You should know that seeing a man get all hot-and-bothered is one of my turn-ons.
Is... is it because you think I'm cute?
~Name~, please begin! It's impossible for me to do it alone without you!
We're all on edge, ~name~. Please begin.
Ah, yes! Ahh!
Don't be shy. We all want to see.
You're doing it all wrong, ~name~. Don't make me come over there and show you.
I think ~name~ needs help...
